Serialized Form

  • Package org.remoteHome

    • Class org.remoteHome.AbstractDevice extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • deviceId

          int deviceId
          This is device id of the hardware device assigned with AT+a=id command

        • deviceName

          java.lang.String deviceName
          This is device name of the hardware device. Free text

    • Class org.remoteHome.BatteryThermostatDevice extends AbstractDevice implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • temperature

          int temperature
          Current temperature

        • expectedTemperature

          int expectedTemperature
          Expected temperature value should be set by external system in order to trigger the temperature change Also the manageTemperatureAuto method should be set to true.

        • manageTemperatureAuto

          boolean manageTemperatureAuto
          Set this to true, if you want to set the expected temperature

        • deviceExpectedTemperature

          int deviceExpectedTemperature
          Device Expected temperature already configured in the device

        • relayOn

          boolean relayOn
          State of the relay, true if the relay is ON

        • frequency

          int frequency
          Frequency in seconds

        • expectedFrequency

          int expectedFrequency
          Expected frequency in seconds value should be set by external system in order to trigger the value change Also the manageOpenAngleAuto method should be set to true.

        • manageFrequencyAuto

          boolean manageFrequencyAuto
          Set this to true, if you want to set the expected frequency

        • battery

          int battery
          Battery

        • threshold

          int threshold
          Threshold 0 - 9. For the self managed mode, the threshold could be set. It means that relay will go off when currentTemperature + threshold / 10 > expected temperature and will
          go on, when currentTemperature - threshold / 10 < expected temperature

        • expectedThreshold

          int expectedThreshold
          Expected threshold should be set by external system in order to set the threshold to the device, as soon as the device sends the status.

        • manageThresholdAuto

          boolean manageThresholdAuto
          Set this to true, if you want to set the expected threshold

    • Class org.remoteHome.BlindsControllerDevice extends AbstractDevice implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blindsControllerListener

          BlindsControllerListener blindsControllerListener
          This listenner listen for the event, when the blind is moved to required position. The user of this API should implement this interface and register it for that event.

        • moving

          boolean moving
          When the blinds are moving already, this is true.

        • movingUp

          boolean movingUp
          When the blinds are moving up, this is true.

        • movingDown

          boolean movingDown
          When the blinds are moving down, this is true.

        • fullRangeTimeout

          int fullRangeTimeout
          Calibration value of the blinds. It is time in seconds, from fully opened position to fully closed position.

        • currentOpening

          int currentOpening
          Current opening is the value in percent of the position. Fully opened is 0, fully closed is 100.

    • Class org.remoteHome.HeatingHeaderDevice extends AbstractDevice implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • temperature

          int temperature
          Current temperature

        • expectedTemperature

          int expectedTemperature
          Expected temperature value should be set by external system in order to trigger the temperature change Also the manageTemperatureAuto method should be set to true.

        • manageTemperatureAuto

          boolean manageTemperatureAuto
          Set this to true, if you want to set the expected temperature

        • deviceExpectedTemperature

          int deviceExpectedTemperature
          Device Expected temperature already configured in the device

        • openAngle

          int openAngle
          Open angle

        • expectedOpenAngle

          int expectedOpenAngle
          Expected open angle value should be set by external system in order to trigger the value change Also the manageOpenAngleAuto method should be set to true.

        • manageOpenAngleAuto

          boolean manageOpenAngleAuto
          Set this to true, if you want to set the expected open angle

        • frequency

          int frequency
          Frequency in seconds

        • expectedFrequency

          int expectedFrequency
          Expected frequency in seconds value should be set by external system in order to trigger the value change Also the manageOpenAngleAuto method should be set to true.

        • manageFrequencyAuto

          boolean manageFrequencyAuto
          Set this to true, if you want to set the expected frequency

        • battery

          int battery
          Battery

    • Class org.remoteHome.LightAlarmDevice extends SimpleSwitchDevice implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • onWhenMovementDetected

          boolean onWhenMovementDetected
          Indicates, if the swith is configured to switch on, when movement detected. True means switch ON, when movement detected and stay defined configured period ON, then switch off, false means to stay OFF.

        • alarmListener

          LightAlarmDeviceListener alarmListener
          Listener to receive the asynchronous alarm event

        • alarmStatus

          int alarmStatus
          Status of the alarm

        • alarmSensorCurrentState

          boolean alarmSensorCurrentState
          Current state of the alarm sensor

        • alarmEnterTimeout

          int alarmEnterTimeout
          Current enter alarm timeout

        • alarmLeaveTimeout

          int alarmLeaveTimeout
          Current leave alarm timeout

    • Class org.remoteHome.RemoteHomeConnectionException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • type

          int type

    • Class org.remoteHome.RemoteHomeManagerException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • type

          int type

    • Class org.remoteHome.SimpleSwitchDevice extends AbstractDevice implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • onWhenAppliedPower

          boolean onWhenAppliedPower
          Indicates, if the swith is configured to switch on, when applied power. True means ON, when applied power, false means to stay OFF.

        • currentState

          boolean currentState
          Indicates the current state of the device. True means ON, false means OFF.

        • configuredPeriod

          int configuredPeriod
          Configured period in minutes.

        • currentCounter

          int currentCounter
          Current counter in minutes. When the counter reach 0, the switch will turn off.

    • Class org.remoteHome.TemperatureSensorDevice extends AbstractDevice implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • temperature

          float temperature
          Current temperature

        • frequency

          int frequency
          Frequency in seconds

        • expectedFrequency

          int expectedFrequency
          Expected frequency in seconds value should be set by external system in order to trigger the value change Also the manageOpenAngleAuto method should be set to true.

        • manageFrequencyAuto

          boolean manageFrequencyAuto
          Set this to true, if you want to set the expected frequency

        • battery

          float battery
          Battery

    • Class org.remoteHome.ThermostatDevice extends AbstractDevice implements Serializable

          Device Expected temperature already configured in the device

        • relayOn

          boolean relayOn
          State of the relay, true if the relay is ON

        • frequency

          int frequency
          Frequency in seconds

        • threshold

          int threshold
          Threshold 0 - 9. For the self managed mode, the threshold could be set. It means that relay will go off when currentTemperature + threshold / 10 > expected temperature and will
          go on, when currentTemperature - threshold / 10 < expected temperature
